mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `team_recruitments` (title, writer, username, content, location, address, live_date, live_st_time, live_end_time, price, capacity, account, views, confirmed, upd_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{writer}, #{username}, #{content}, #{location}, #{address}, #{liveDate}, #{liveStTime}, #{liveEndTime}, #{price}, #{capacity}, #{account}, 0, 0, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE `team_recruitments` SET title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, content = #{content}, location = #{location}, address = #{address}, live_date = #{liveDate}, live_st_time = #{liveStTime}, live_end_time = #{liveEndTime}, price = #{price}, capacity = #{capacity}, account = #{account}, upd_date = now() WHERE team_no =#{teamNo}
mapper.select: SELECT t.*, c.crew AS crew, c.upd_date AS confirmedDate FROM `team_recruitments` AS t JOIN `confirmed_live` AS c ON (t.team_no = c.team_no) WHERE t.username = #{username}

SELECT
IF(CEIL(#{pageNo} / #{pageCount}) = 1, 1, (CEIL(#{pageNo} / #{pageCount}) - 1) * #{pageCount} + 1) AS startPage,
IF(CEIL(#{pageNo} / #{pageCount}) * #{pageCount} > CEIL(#{totalCount} / #{rows}), CEIL(#{totalCount} / #{rows}), CEIL(#{pageNo} / #{pageCount}) * #{pageCount}) AS endPage,
1 AS firstPage,
CEIL(#{totalCount} / #{rows}) AS lastPage,
IF(#{pageNo} > 1, #{pageNo} - 1, 1) AS prev,
IF(#{pageNo} < CEIL(#{totalCount} / #{rows}), #{pageNo} + 1, CEIL(#{totalCount} / #{rows})) AS next,
#{totalCount} AS totalCount

SELECT t.*,count(a.team_no) AS recStatus FROM team_recruitments AS t LEFT JOIN team_applications AS a ON (t.team_no = a.team_no AND a.deposit_status = 1) WHERE
(t.title LIKE "%${keyword}%" OR t.content LIKE "%${keyword}%" OR t.writer LIKE "%${keyword}%") t.title LIKE "%${keyword}%" t.content LIKE "%${keyword}%" (t.title LIKE "%${keyword}%" OR t.content LIKE "%${keyword}%") t.writer LIKE "%${keyword}%"
GROUP BY t.team_no ORDER BY
t.upd_date DESC t.title DESC t.views DESC
LIMIT #{pageNo}, #{rows};
